title: C# Programming - Coding with C# Syntax
headline: Learn about the syntax of the C sharp programming language and improve your coding skills with this free online course.
description: This free online C Sharp Programming course will teach you the basics of coding correctly formatted C# syntax with Visual Studio Express. C# is a simple but powerful, modern computer programming language that can be used to create almost anything, and is particularly useful for building Windows desktop applications and games. C# Coding is one of the most widely used tools, professionals with knowledge of C# Programming are always in high demand.
courseDescription:
This course will first introduce you to C# Programming. You will look into C# Programming statements and C# Programming expressions as well as study unary operator, binary operator, conditional operator, equality operator, and assignment operator. The course will discuss the keywords used in iteration statements which can cause embedded statements to be executed a number of times, subject to the loop-termination criteria. You will also study the types of classes by which Methods are declared.

You will then study the While Iteration which can help you execute a statement or a block of statements until a specified expression evaluates to false. The course will discuss the character escape sequences in C# which include the \\ Backslash, the \a Alert, the \n Newline, and the \r Carriage return. You will look into the string.format method, the Concatenation process, the StringBuilder class, and the DateTime class. You will also study the ToLongDateStringO and the AddDaysO.

Every web developer who builds high-level programming languages or wants to learn this skill will find this C# Programming - Coding with C# Syntax online course very useful and valuable. You will learn how to write correct C# syntax for operators, expressions, and statements of duration with the use of Visual Studio Express to build .NET applications. So, check out this course and enhance your web development skills for your personal and career advancement today!

Start Course Now
